explanation: Mile, Pound, Gallon, and Second are all standard units used to quantify different physical properties (distance, weight/mass, volume, and time, respectively). A Ruler is an instrument used for measuring, not a unit of measurement itself.

category: Seven Ancient Wonders of the World
explanation: The Pyramid of Giza, Hanging Gardens of Babylon, Lighthouse of Alexandria, and Colossus of Rhodes are all recognized as four of the Seven Ancient Wonders of the World. The Acropolis of Athens, while historically significant, is not one of the designated Seven Wonders.

Metamorphose, Transmogrify, Convert, and Transform all describe processes of active and often dramatic alteration or transformation. Stagnate, however, means to cease to develop or progress, representing a lack of change.
